Name: A LONEY
About the game: Welcome to the fantasy world of A LONEY. Get ready for an exciting adventure with the main character! The world is filled with various creatures threatening the world! Grab your sword and deal with them! The game is a 2D platformer with RPG elements. You have to move around the locations, clearing rooms from enemies and solving simple puzzles along the way. For a long time, hostile monsters threaten humanity and no one in the village dared to fight back! The main character decides to arm himself with an iron sword and, taking with him a pair of throwing knives, go into battle!
